name: Dream Berry
description: Dream Berry is a sweet, fruity cross between Blue Dream and Blackberry. Its calming indica qualities prevail over its sativa genetics. The breeders at Apothecary Genetics recommend a short 6 to 7 week flowering time for indoor gardens, or the end of September for outdoor cultivators.Â
attributes_title: Relaxed, Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Giggly, Pain, Depression, Stress, Insomnia, Lack of Appetite, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Dry Eyes, Headache
